subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Women)
Basketball
College Athletics
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: It is time for Pat Summitt and Geno Auriemma to put aside their sniping and resume the regular-season rivalry that has been the foundation of women’s basketball.
snippet: It is time for Pat Summitt and Geno Auriemma to put aside their sniping and resume the regular-season rivalry that has been the foundation of women’s basketball.
